title: King of the Skill

properties.name: description
properties.value: King of the Skill was a temporary game mode where players competed to gain the most experience in 24 hours of game play. From 1 November 2017 until 30 November, any account with membership would be able to log into dedicated game servers and compete with other players to gain the most experience in a skill, or the highest total level.

content:
King of the Skill was a temporary game mode where players competed to gain the most experience in 24 hours of game play. From 1 November 2017 until 30 November, any account with membership would be able to log into dedicated game servers and compete with other players to gain the most experience in a skill, or the highest total level.

Prizes were awarded to the top 10 total level winners, and prizes were awarded to the top 5 skill winners for each skill. Dedicated hiscores were set up to track the competition.

Contents

  • 1 Boosts and Restrictions
  • 2 Prizes
    • 2.1 Total Level Winners
    • 2.2 Skill Winners
  • 3 Winners
    • 3.1 Total Level
    • 3.2 Skills

Boosts and Restrictions[edit | edit source]

Unlike most other game modes, King of the Skill was close to the core game experience as the main servers. However, there were some changes:

  • All accounts acted as ironmen
    • Consequently, the Grand Exchange was disabled
  • All experience gained was multiplied by 10. This included experience lamps and quest rewards.
  • Accounts could only log in to these worlds for a maximum of 24 hours game play. Accounts could log off at any time, with the time pausing.
  • A counter displayed how much of the 24 hours was remaining.
  • Skippy would allow players to skip Tutorial Island.

Prizes[edit | edit source]

Per category, each prize was awarded to unique players. For example, if an individual had multiple accounts reach the top 5 of a skill, they would only receive one prize for that skill, but could receive other prizes for different skills.

Total Level Winners[edit | edit source]

  • 1st - Limited Edition Old School Gaming PC from Chillblast!, Signed and framed Old School Artwork & LIFETIME Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 2nd - ICON Series Gaming Chair from Noble Chairs, Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 3rd - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 4th - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 5th - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 6th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
  • 7th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
  • 8th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
  • 9th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice
  • 10th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice

Skill Winners[edit | edit source]

  • 1st - Old School Merch Goodie Bag, signed and framed Old School artwork and a LIFETIME Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 2nd - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
  • 3rd - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
  • 4th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice
  • 5th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice

Winners[edit | edit source]

You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.

rawContent:
'''King of the Skill''' was a temporary game mode where players competed to gain the most experience in 24 hours of game play. From [[1 November]] [[2017]] until [[30 November]], any account with membership would be able to log into dedicated game servers and compete with other players to gain the most experience in a skill, or the highest total level.

Prizes were awarded to the top 10 total level winners, and prizes were awarded to the top 5 skill winners for each skill. Dedicated hiscores were set up to track the competition.

== Boosts and Restrictions ==
Unlike most other game modes, King of the Skill was close to the core game experience as the main servers. However, there were some changes:

* All accounts acted as [[ironmen]]
** Consequently, the [[Grand Exchange]] was disabled
* All experience gained was multiplied by 10. This included experience lamps and quest rewards.
* Accounts could only log in to these worlds for a maximum of 24 hours game play. Accounts could log off at any time, with the time pausing.
* A counter displayed how much of the 24 hours was remaining.
* [[Skippy]] would allow players to skip [[Tutorial Island]].

== Prizes ==
Per category, each prize was awarded to unique players. For example, if an individual had multiple accounts reach the top 5 of a skill, they would only receive one prize for that skill, but could receive other prizes for different skills.

=== Total Level Winners ===

* 1st - Limited Edition Old School Gaming PC from Chillblast!, Signed and framed Old School Artwork & LIFETIME Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 2nd - ICON Series Gaming Chair from Noble Chairs, Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 3rd - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 4th - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 5th - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 6th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
* 7th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
* 8th - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
* 9th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice
* 10th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice

=== Skill Winners ===

* 1st - Old School Merch Goodie Bag, signed and framed Old School artwork and a LIFETIME Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 2nd - Signed and framed Old School Artwork & Premier Club gold package on an account of your choice
* 3rd - Premier Club silver package on an account of your choice
* 4th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice
* 5th - Premier Club bronze package on an account of your choice
